name: Interior
description: The type of car wash setup where vehicles are placed on a conveyor system, which moves them through different tools to clean interior. Even though it’s automated in terms of moving the car, the washing process itself largely relies on manual labor.

name: Exterior
description: The type of car wash setup where vehicles are placed on a conveyor system, which moves them through different tools to clean exterior. Even though it’s automated in terms of moving the car, the washing process itself largely relies on manual labor.

name: Self Service
description: The type of car wash setup where customers wash their own vehicles using a pressure washer and other tools.

name: Conveyor
description: The type of car wash setup where vehicles are placed on a conveyor system, which moves them through different tools to clean exterior.
